awd_titl_txt: Planning Grant for a Joint Industry/University Cooperative  Center Called the Optoelectrnic Circuitry and Packaging     (OCP) Center
awd_abstract_narration: This award is for a planning grant to determine the interest               of industry in joining a satellite I/UCRC to the established I/UCRC             for Optoelectronic Circuitry presently in operation at the                      University of Arizona.  This satellite I/UCRC is planned for the                University of Maryland and will complement the activities of the                I/UCRC at the University of Arizona.  The focus of the proposed                 I/UCRC at the University of Maryland will be Optoelectronic                     interconnect and packaging.                                                          The Program Director recommends an award of $10,000 for one                year be awarded to the University of Maryland for the planning                  grant.
org_div_long_name: Division of Engineering Education and Centers
